synergynetframework.jme.gfx.twod
Class Grid

java.lang.Object
  com.jme.scene.Spatial
      com.jme.scene.Geometry
          com.jme.scene.TriMesh
              synergynetframework.jme.gfx.twod.Grid
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme.util.export.Savable, java.io.Serializable
public class Grid
extends com.jme.scene.TriMesh

Grid defines a four sided, two dimensional rectangular shape. The local height of the Quad defines it's size about the y-axis, while the width defines the x-axis. The z-axis will always be 0. The plane is subdivided into one or more sections along each axis, to form a grid of smaller quads.

Version:
$Id: Grid.java 675 2007-03-31 23:33:25Z dougnukem $
Author:
shingoki
See Also:

Constructor Detail

Grid

public Grid(java.lang.String name,
            float width,
            float height,
            int xQuads,
            int yQuads,
            boolean centered)
Constructor creates a new Quade object with the provided width and height.

Parameters:
name - The name of the Quad.
width - The width of the Quad.
height - The height of the Quad.
xQuads - The number of quads along the x axis
yQuads - The number of quads along the y axis
centered - If true, grid is centered on 0,0,0, otherwise the grid is from 0, 0, 0 to width, height, 0
Method Detail

initialize

public void initialize(float width,
                       float height,
                       int xQuads,
                       int yQuads,
                       boolean centered)
initialize builds the data for the Grid object.

Parameters:
width - the width of the Quad.
height - the height of the Quad.
xQuads - The number of quads along the x axis
yQuads - The number of quads along the y axis
centered - If true, grid is centered on 0,0,0, otherwise the grid is from 0, 0, 0 to width, height, 0

movePoint

public void movePoint(int xIndex,
                      int yIndex,
                      float x,
                      float y)
Move a point within the grid.

Parameters:
xIndex - The x index of the point, from 0 to xQuads
yIndex - The y index of the point, from 0 to yQuads
x - The new x coordinate of the point
y - The new y coordinate of the point

moveUV

public void moveUV(int xIndex,
                   int yIndex,
                   float x,
                   float y)
Move the texture coord of a point within the grid.

Parameters:
xIndex - The x index of the point, from 0 to xQuads
yIndex - The y index of the point, from 0 to yQuads
x - The new texture x coordinate of the point
y - The new texture y coordinate of the point
